::Hot Rod/Prowl/Epyon/Skyburst::

They dodge the shots.

Prowl flies up at SS.
"This is stupid. I see one of you, and their is nine of us, with another
three on the way. Why dont you just run like hell, and we wont scrap
you."
He locks on his missiles, just in case.

Hot Rod transformes to bot mode, and locks on his two missiles.
"We dont have time for this. Scrap him, and lets be on our way."

Skyburst moves closer to SS while in helicoptor mode. His two missiles
and gattaling guns ready.

Epyon moves in, the form of the massive two headed transmetal dragon
should be terrifying. Both the double heads start to breath fire, ready
to burn SS.
